item.title: 周三，旧金山的人群排成长队，观看和嗅闻一种濒临灭绝的热带花朵的绽放，这种花每隔几年开放一次，会释放出刺鼻的气味。
item.description:
Crowds lined up in San Francisco on Wednesday to see — and smell — the blooming of an endangered tropical flower that releases a pungent odor when it opens once every several years. pic.twitter.com/Jw1N5GKGWg

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 29, 2024
